roleset.name: to approve, condone
roleset.note: COUNTENANCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'countenance' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from countenance.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Although [*-2] encouraging dialogue between managers and workers , Mr. Smith does n't countenance what he considers [*T*-1]insubordination .
example.arg: Although [*-2] encouraging dialogue between managers and workers
